display_long_description:
**If you have never heard the word vivarium, you might want to know that a vivarium is an enclosure and hobby where you can create an environment to grow plants and raise animals.**

In Vivarium, you can mix nature and urban elements to create your own vivariums.
[media]

# Aquascaping is here!

The perfect feature to design your future aquarium has arrived!

- 18 saltwater animals including fish, anemones, starfish, etc.
- 10 different marine algae
- And other elements to create your perfect aquarium (corals, figures, etc.)

[media]

# Key features

🐸Raise your own diverse and exotic pets
- Adopt animals in your vivarium and build their perfect home.

🌱Learn about Terrarium
- Experience the hobby of building your own terrarium in virtual or mixed reality. 

🐠Design your own Aquarium
- Change your workshop to build aquariums, and practice your future aquascaping skills.

🗿Develop your creativity with diverse materials and figures
- Use different rocks, driftwood, mosses, and themed figures to create your own small world.

🖼️Share your vivarium with other players
- Display your vivariums in the game’s lobby so that other players can see them and share their support for your work.

❤️Look after your plants and pets
- Make sure to take good care of the living beings in your vivarium, and collect all the species in the game.

In Vivarium, you can mix nature and urban elements to create your own vivariums.

# Aquascaping is here!

The perfect feature to design your future aquarium has arrived!

- 18 saltwater animals including fish, anemones, starfish, etc.
- 10 different marine algae
- And other elements to create your perfect aquarium (corals, figures, etc.)

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491821201_685153693891288_2985437068095334436_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=4EweuhoLyZUQ7kNvwHQcKY2&_nc_oc=AdnYoJ_RY1u2oBKtem-xAj_p2rrMFRM-tJSJKiAps5IMe7nWO84P0aEIM3lwWgSCdvU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=GdA3jhJrTj2uMwQMpDk2bg&oh=00_AfOzPm56TR4pMpUnmWo0tFYnfV4IPMGxbMAiqZGnp4NliQ&oe=685CA89E)

# Key features

🐸Raise your own diverse and exotic pets
- Adopt animals in your vivarium and build their perfect home.

🌱Learn about Terrarium
- Experience the hobby of building your own terrarium in virtual or mixed reality. 

🐠Design your own Aquarium
- Change your workshop to build aquariums, and practice your future aquascaping skills.

🗿Develop your creativity with diverse materials and figures
- Use different rocks, driftwood, mosses, and themed figures to create your own small world.

🖼️Share your vivarium with other players
- Display your vivariums in the game’s lobby so that other players can see them and share their support for your work.

❤️Look after your plants and pets
- Make sure to take good care of the living beings in your vivarium, and collect all the species in the game.
